body:
On Mon, Jul 16, 2012 at 6:14 PM, Ryan Southall <R.Southall at brighton.ac.uk>wrote:



That's what I thought. I think I can wait a bit longer for it to stabilise.




You can also hack the genskyvec.pl script and add a line to print out the
input that the script actually gets. If this is not what you expect it to
be then you have to look at your use of Popen again.

Thomas
